programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Add More Color
programme.desc: Mr. Brown gives Sandra advice on how to get what she wants and her outfit for school. Sandra apologises to her parents. Leah grows concerned with Sandra's sudden change of heart. (S1, ep18)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: The Brown Bomber
programme.desc: Mr. Brown becomes anxious to open the assisted living facility. Everyone becomes concerned when Mr. Brown tries to drum up business before they're ready to open. (S1, ep19)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Open For Business
programme.desc: Mr. Brown's live video about the facility goes viral. Lindor offers to be a helping hand around the living facility. Philip brings attention to Lindor's enormous appetite. (S1, ep20)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: Being A Good Citizen
programme.desc: Mr. Brown tells Leah what Cora thinks about her cooking. Leah and Cora become concerned about Lindor's behaviour. Cora tries to convince Mr.Brown the facility will need a nurse. (S1, ep21)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: To Trust Or Not To Trust
programme.desc: Jeremy and Leah have reason to finally be confident about their decision to move. Sandra has a change of heart concerning Lindor, and her parents want to know why. (S1, ep22)
programme.sub-title: To Trust Or Not To Trust

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: A Fight For Honor
programme.desc: Jeremy and Leah are infuriated after learning what Sheriff Luckett has done to Sandra. Mr. Brown takes on the responsibility of preparing dinner for the kids. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: A Dangerous Situation
programme.desc: Cora tries to convince Mr. Brown to pitch in and help get Jeremy out of jail. Jeremy and Leah have a conversation with Sandra about invading her privacy. (S1, ep24)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Assisted Living: The Dirty Denial
programme.desc: Vinny is in an unusually good mood and causes everyone concern. Plans to open the living facility come to a halt when Vinny receives disturbing news. (S1, ep25)

programme.title: Black Card Revoked: 101
programme.desc: Based on the popular new home game, Black Card Revoked is a comedic, celebrity-driven panel game show that dives into everything about black culture. From black history to the ever growing catalogue of pop culture events, happenings, and trends.

programme.title: Black Card Revoked: 102
programme.desc: Based on the popular new home game, Black Card Revoked is a comedic, celebrity-driven panel game show that dives into everything about black culture. From black history to the ever growing catalogue of pop culture events, happenings, and trends.

programme.title: Black Card Revoked: 103
programme.desc: Based on the popular new home game, Black Card Revoked is a comedic, celebrity-driven panel game show that dives into everything about black culture. From black history to the ever growing catalogue of pop culture events, happenings, and trends.

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Facing Fears
programme.desc: When Mary Jane is rushed to the hospital after her accident the family rallies around her. Paul Sr. handles David, and Helen unburdens them of Lisa while Kara fights for Mary Jane at SNC. (S3, ep1)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Yellow Dress
programme.desc: Gary and Jasmine confront each other and the gloves come off. Andi struggles to maintain her career. Karen is confronted by a new enemy. Sabrina grows frustrated. (S1, ep22)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Home For A Queen
programme.desc: The ladies are concerned about Andi and her relationship choice. Sabrina stands strong for all of her friends who seem to be under attack. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: Paranormal State: Satan's Soldier
programme.desc: Mark and Kim can't sleep through the racket caused by unseen forces in their central Indiana home. When PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger discover what appears to be blood in the basement, they investigate a history of violence in the home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Woman in the Window
programme.desc: Ryan and his team lend paranormal assistance to a family who lives in a historic home that was once a part of the Underground Railroad. Does the answer to their haunting lie in the mysterious tunnels beneath the house?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hide and Seek
programme.desc: Hillary and her nine-year-old son Hunter are being harassed by a shadow presence in their Victorian home in Newburgh, Indiana. Trap doors in the basement reveal artifacts from a bygone era, and the clients have recorded persistent strange noises.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Pet Cemetery
programme.desc: Ryan and his team investigate the bizarre haunting of a woman and her dog in Waterboro, Maine. The Labrador was chewing at her own fur and standing on guard on the bed, growling at unseen figures.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Sixth Sense
programme.desc: A worried mother calls the Paranormal Research Society to help her son Matthew, a boy who sees dead people. Matthew's story strikes a chord with team leader Ryan Buell who also experienced paranormal activity as a child.

programme.title: Paranormal State: I Am Six
programme.desc: Laura has felt oppressed by a violent spirit ever since she heard a chilling EVP in the fall of 2007. The 26-year-old claims she's been beaten, choked, even forcibly submerged.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shape Shifter
programme.desc: PRS travels to Shapleigh, Maine where a woman and her daughter are reporting attacks from a winged creature with sharp teeth. Psychic Chip Coffey arrives and senses a half-human, half animal presence.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Ghost On the Tracks
programme.desc: PRS is called to a New Jersey beauty salon, but they soon learn that the building's proximity to deadly train tracks might be the true cause of spirit activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Permission To Do Harm
programme.desc: When a mirror levitates and shatters on its own, P.R.S. heeds the call to investigate a spirit that has been unleashed on an unsuspecting family. Ryan must track down the spirit and contain it before it does irreparable damage.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Fury
programme.desc: Kathy, her two daughters and her new husband, "Farmer" thought they had the perfect, quiet life deep in the mountains of West Virginia.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Do Bad Things
programme.desc: After receiving a letter requesting PRS' help, Ryan and the team head to Ohio to help a grieving family and determine if the family's house contributed to the untimely death of a daughter.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Avebury Stones and the Red Lion Inn
programme.desc: Avebury Stones and the Red Lion Inn are supposedly the most paranormal places in Great Britain. Three ghosts are said to haunt have been haunting the Red Lion Inn since the 1600s.
programme.sub-title: Avebury Stones and the Red Lion Inn

programme.title: Most Haunted: Drury Lane Theatre
programme.desc: The Theatre Royal, Drury Lane is considered the most haunted theatre in the world. Will the team encounter the theatre's most famous ghost, the "Man in Grey?"

programme.title: Most Haunted: Leap Castle
programme.desc: The team make their way to Leap Castle in Ireland, which is said to be home to a half-human, half-animal ghost.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Ostrich Inn
programme.desc: The village of Colnbrook is home to one of the oldest pubs in Great Britain, the Ostrich Inn. Legend has it that in the 1400s over 60 people met their death there, boiled in oil by the evil landlord.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Souter Lighthouse
programme.desc: Yvette and the team travel to the historic Souter Lighthouse. Derek detects the sudden smell of tobacco at the top of the building and equipment begins switching itself on and off.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Charnock Hall
programme.desc: In the 1600s, Catholicism was frowned upon in Britain and many masses were conducted in Charnock Hall in secrecy. Current owners and past residents have witnessed priestly apparitions manifest.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Culzean Castle
programme.desc: Culzean Castle in Ayrshire, Scotland is supposed to be haunted by seven ghosts. Derek arrives and takes the crew straight to the most haunted room in the house, the Earl of Cassillis's bedroom.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Mermaid Inn
programme.desc: The ghosts of smugglers terrify the crew when they spend 24 hours at the Mermaid Inn. A haunted chair moves on its own and reports of ghostly men fighting a duel a bedrooms spur the team on.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Blackpool Pleasure Beach
programme.desc: The team spends 24 hours at Blackpool's famous funfair to investigate a haunted ghost train and poltergeist activity. Derek sees ghostly children in the gift shop and phantom footsteps are heard.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Treasure Holt House
programme.desc: Stories of witchcraft, murder and human sacrifice bring the team to Treasure Holt. Derek is guided by the spirit of a monk and contacts two of the ghosts seen in what was once a house of disrepute.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Derby Gaol
programme.desc: Historian Richard Felix joins Yvette and the team as they are locked inside Derby Gaol, where scenes of total incarceration and brutal executions have taken place since 1756.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Aldwych Underground Station
programme.desc: Yvette and Jason dress up in 1940s army uniforms as they investigate Aldwych Station, which was built after demolishing a theatre in 1907, and used as an air raid shelter during WWII.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Charleville Forest Castle
programme.desc: Located in the center of Ireland, Charleville Forest Castle is built on the site of an ancient burial ground where plague victims were buried in the 1700s. The team holds a Victorian-style séance.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: As Difficult as ABC
programme.desc: Jonathan steps in when a heart condition sidelines a promising basketball player's dreams.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Child of God
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are on hand when a dying woman attempts a reconciliation with her estranged father. She is a single mother who wants her family to take the child.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Match Made in Heaven
programme.desc: Scotty is a lovelorn quadriplegic with a successful law practice. Jonathan is happy to play cupid, but Mark isn't so thrilled about it, because the woman in question is his cousin.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Banker and The Bum
programme.desc: A greedy banker and a good-hearted bum switch places. The bum dies, but the banker is now infused with love and generosity.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Brightest Star
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark meet a child star whose fame is spoiling her rotten, destroying her family and taking away her childhood.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Investment In Caring
programme.desc: Jonathan encourages residents in a neighborhood to unite against a cold-hearted developer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Jonathan inspires a young man to help the grandfather who has recently been placed in a nursing home.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Gill Collyer
programme.desc: A hectic household of 3 lively kids, 1 husband, 4 cats and a dog, equals chaos and stress for Gill Collyer from Devon and it's showing all over her face. Luckily Nicky Hambleton-Jones and her team are here to the rescue.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: From Father To Son
programme.desc: Tobe took a hiatus from his career to care for his dying father, and now he's trying to pick up where he left off. Tobe needs to refurbish his appearance so he can look like the man his younger wife married.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Dawn Of A New Day
programme.desc: Dawn Peluso is a stay at home mother of three. Taking care of her children is a full time job – one that doesn't allow personal pamper breaks. Dawn is afraid her looks are going out with the dirty diapers, and she is concerned for her marriage.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Wendy Grace
programme.desc: Ex glamour model and air hostess Wendy Grace lost her good looks when she gave up that life for a market stall in Christchurch. Hair, make up and a new wardrobe will all help in the fight to make Wendy look younger but her face needs urgent repair work.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Knockout Makeover
programme.desc: As a former title holding boxer and stuntwoman, Bridgett spent years getting pummeled and abused and her looks are now suffering. We're going to unleash Bridgett's feminine flair and make her look 10 years younger!

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Diamond in the Rough
programme.desc: Dashia is a spinning instructor by day and a feisty tenants rights advocate in her spare time. Our Glam Squad and team of doctors are going to take this diamond in the rough and smooth out some of the sharp edges.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Hope for the Best
programme.desc: Hope is a dedicated single parent who has been told she dresses too old for her age. Along with the daily stresses of work and motherhood, the recent loss of Hope's mother's has also taken its toll on her appearance.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Felicia Gets Her Groove Back
programme.desc: After the death of both her mother and boyfriend, Felicia is trying to get back her zest for life. She has surrendered to the experts on hand to help her jump back into her old self. Will she rebound for a slam-dunk makeover?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Standing Up To Her Past
programme.desc: Norma Jean is a single, working mother of two whom by night makes audiences laugh as a stand-up comic, but worries that her tired and worn down appearance may be what they're laughing at instead.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Debbie Ashcroft
programme.desc: 46 year old Debbie Ashcroft is a lifelong smoker and sunbed addict with the peculiar habit of bleaching her hair up to six times a week. Can the expect team make Debbie look 10 years younger?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Head Of The Class
programme.desc: A painful divorce has undermined Cindy's confidence, but she's trying to start life over. Experts boost her looks and her morale.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Tomboy to 10
programme.desc: Stephanie is an avid soccer player, but she doesn't get much of a kick out of life anymore. Stephanie's worst fear about her appearance is her teeth, or rather her missing tooth and she also thinks her skin is aging prematurely.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: The Most Revealing Reveal Ever
programme.desc: After years of sunbathing, Stefanie hid her sun-damaged skin under frumpy and matronly clothes. But after a flurry of skin treatments, Stefanie stuns her family and friends at one of our most revealing reveals ever!

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Budding New Look
programme.desc: When Rose was growing up, she was called "the ugliest girl" at her high school. Even though she is now grown up and has a loving fiancé, those cruel comments from her past still haunt her.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 6
programme.desc: Danny is in prison, accused of murdering Peeters, but Du Plessis is determined to prove his friend's innocence by any means he can. Du Plessis' first attempt backfires disastrously when he harangues a police officer and ends up in a cell next to Danny.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 7
programme.desc: With Danny away, and Du Plessis undertaking an ignominious stretch of community service, Ed is left in charge of running the Endangered Species Project.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 8
programme.desc: Danny and Ed are anxiously preparing for a review with JLW, the pharmaceutical company that fund their Endangered Species Project. They are desperate for it to go smoothly, and as a result are driving the rest of the family mad.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 9
programme.desc: Following the loss of their funding, the family are in dire financial straits. Danny and Ed attempt to get an extension on their mortgage but are refused. Fiona spurs Ed on, telling him that the man she used to know would have a plan for survival.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 10
programme.desc: Strange things are happening at Leopard's Den. The family awake to find frogs everywhere, seemingly having rained down overnight; the giraffe refuses to budge from the front gate and the cheetah is off its food.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: New Year's Eve at Leopard's Den. Alice has returned, but the stress of combining work with caring for baby Bobby is causing tension between her and Danny. Liv is furious that Fatani hasn't told his mother about their relationship.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Scabby Monkey
programme.desc: Contending with overweight cats and their over protective owners was not what Danny Trevanion had in mind when he became a vet. So when a scruffy, barely alive African monkey arrives at his practise Danny is fascinated by the challenge.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 5
programme.desc: Motorbike rider, Lachlan was testing out his newly designed dirt-bike track when he lost control on a jump. His femur has been badly shattered. The Air Rescue crew is tasked with flying Lachlan to hospital but his medical dramas have only just begun.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 6
programme.desc: Retirees Diane and husband Gary were just a few hours into their Pacific Island cruise of a lifetime when disaster struck. Diane toppled down a set of stairs and now she's in need of urgent medical attention.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 1
programme.desc: A leisure helicopter has gone down in Sydney's Royal National Park with a family of four on board, including three year-old Finn. The stakes are always high when children are involved. The rescue crew locates the crash site but can't get too close.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 2
programme.desc: Three surfing mates go missing in dangerous surf. The massive swell threatens to smash them onto the rocks in Sydney's Lurline Bay. The rescue crew is on a search and rescue mission but there's no sign of the surfer boys.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 6
programme.desc: The helicopter rescue crew responds to Pauanui to save a truck driver who's smashed through the windscreen after rolling his truck and a Port Charles family is distraught after a young girl is run over by a quad bike.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 7
programme.desc: The chopper crewmen have their hands full with five badly injured patients after a car crash near Waiuku, and a massive motorcycle pile-up leaves injured bikers all over the road, and a man may have broken his neck after falling from his horse.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 8
programme.desc: As a weather bomb hits, the chopper crew set out on one of the most challenging missions they have ever undertaken 20 miles off shore, a man lays face down at Muriwai beach unable to move.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 9
programme.desc: A hang glider pilot may have broken his back after a heavy crash-landing, a Manaia man is in a bad way after coming off a sea biscuit at high speed, and a crashed Waikato driver needs an urgent air-lift to hospital to save his life.

programme.title: Chopper Squad: Episode 10
programme.desc: A motocross rider may have broken his back after hitting a tree head on at high speed, at a sawmill a man faces its worse nightmares; and a woman is fighting for her life after taking an accidental overdose of her husband's medication.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 3
programme.desc: A monster swell has trapped two teenage girls on the rocks at Sydney's North Head. As high-tide approaches, a daring double-winch rescue is their only option – to stop the teenagers from being swept out to sea.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 4
programme.desc: 55-year-old Gold Coast holidaymaker Irina is in real trouble - she's caught in a deadly ocean rip. Like many tourists, Irena was unaware of the risks of not swimming between the beach flags. The Gold Coast rescue helicopter spots her in the nick of time.

programme.title: Air Rescue: Episode 5
programme.desc: A head-on car collision in Tasmania has left tourists Hong and Xeu Wu fighting for their lives. Ambulance crews have managed to stabilize Mr. Wu but Mrs. Wu is in a critical condition and calling out for her husband.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 4
programme.desc: Jarryd's been busted for drugs in a country where they still have the death penalty. And now he plans to double-cross the Thai authorities and escape to Singapore with his pregnant girlfriend.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 5
programme.desc: Beau was left for dead by the side of a road after a horrific motorbike crash. Now he wants to discharge himself from hospital. Can the embassy stop him before he self-destructs?

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 6
programme.desc: The embassy visits a convicted drug dealer in the world's most notorious prison. But Steven claims he's the innocent victim of an undercover drug sting gone wrong.

programme.title: Supercars: British Power
programme.desc: Very British: power and performance, craftsmanship and design. We have a look at the most beautiful cars of Aston Martin, Bentley and Rolls-Royce.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Fastest Cars in the World
programme.desc: In this episode, we decide what's hot and what's not in the glamorous world of cars. This time we've decided to focus on the fastest cars.
programme.sub-title: The Fastest Cars in the World

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Expensive Production Cars
programme.desc: Real luxury. The kind of cars that you only dream of. On today's Top Ten Show, we're going to expose the most expensive cars in production.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Ten Slowest Cars
programme.desc: Usually, when you talk about cars, it's all about their speed and velocity. But this time we’ve decided to turn the tables and are going to show you the opposite end of the spectrum: the ten most sluggish cars.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Ten Most Fuel-efficient Cars
programme.desc: Fuel prices keep going up. Oil companies are justifying this with high demands and rising oil prices. And the prices will carry-on going up. So on today's show we are showing you ten of the most fuel-efficient cars.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Unusual Cars of Modern Times
programme.desc: Day in day out, R&D departments of car manufacturers ponder over about what constitutes the perfect car. It has to be extraordinary. It has to stand out and it has to be unique.
programme.sub-title: The Most Unusual Cars of Modern Times

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race
programme.desc: The 24-hour-race at the German Nürburgring is one of the most famous and dangerous long-distance races in the world and in today's program we'll show you the cars that have won the most titles each year.
programme.sub-title: The Most Successful Cars in the 24h Race

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Affordable Hybrid Models
programme.desc: In today's show, we are going to show you the most affordable hybrid models. The trail-blazers are definitely the Japanese, who have a whole bunch of cars to offer.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Oldest Car Manufacturers
programme.desc: It’s time to get nostalgic: who do you think is the most important pioneer of the automotive world? We do a little time travel and trace back the trail of the modern car.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Greatest Car Legends
programme.desc: Some cars are not just a means of transport, but influenced entire generations and became legends on their own. That’s why we won’t talk about expensive, fast or successful cars on this episode.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Ugliest Cars
programme.desc: The car-manufacturers' design departments are constantly tinkering around, in a quest to invent the perfect car. And more often than not, very elegantly-shaped cars are the result.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Most Beautiful Cars
programme.desc: Today we are going for Lux. It has been said that beauty is in the eye of the beholder. So we promise to maintain some objectivity. Desirable cars are what we want, and what we shall get.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Rarest Automobiles
programme.desc: Most manufacturers sell their models in other countries. The production figures, therefore, easily rise into the hundreds of thousands.

programme.title: Top Ten Show: The Best Sport Versions of Small Cars
programme.desc: Almost every compact car is now available in a sporty version. And funnily enough the little racers usually have more power under the bonnet than you might think.
programme.sub-title: The Best Sport Versions of Small Cars

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 01
programme.desc: An angry bull, a few English people prepared for the weather and a young, talented race driver - tourists will be venturing down to the infamous 'green hell' of the Nürburgring!

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Miracle
programme.desc: Boone helps prevents a suicide of a handless girl. Da'an wants to use revolutionary Taelon technology to help the girl for propaganda reasons.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Avatar
programme.desc: Boone and Marquette must find James Pike, a mysterious escaped serial killer who rose from the dead.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Old Flame
programme.desc: While plutonium is stolen from a nuclear plant, Boone is is having a tough time concentrating. His mind is on Elyse Chapel, a famous musician and old flame.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Live Free or Die
programme.desc: Navy Seal major Raymond McIntyre kidnaps Da'an and demands to know where his men are. They were involved in a inter-dimensional space flight test that went wrong.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Secret of Standhill
programme.desc: An Irish guide finds the possible burial location of Ma'el, a Taelon that came to Earth 2000 years ago. It is crucial for the Taelons to find his research material.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Devil You Know
programme.desc: While a dying colonel implants his brain in a deceased criminal, the Taelons show a new electromagnetic pulse weapon. Jonathan Doors wishes to acquire it.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Law and Order
programme.desc: The Synod agrees to let Rho'ha be charged with murder in a human court. He will be prosecuted by Joshua Doors, the son of Jonathan Doors.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Through the Looking Glass
programme.desc: A new inter-dimensional portal system for human travel turns out to be something more when the resistance discover a CVI in a boy who got lost in the system.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: I Will Hunt You Down
programme.desc: When two escaped inmates surface in Colorado Springs, it’s up to Lt. Joe Kenda and his Fugitive Unit to bring them to justice.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Murder in a Bottle
programme.desc: Eric Houston is found stabbed to death in a seedy motel, but the ensuing investigation is stymied by a long list of suspects. Lt. Joe Kenda deploys a groundbreaking new technology to catch the killer.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: John 3:16
programme.desc: A man rushes his friend to the hospital with serious gunshot wounds, reporting they were robbed by strangers. When the facts don’t add up, Lt. Joe Kenda and his team go on the hunt.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Body in the Freezer
programme.desc: A meeting between two businessmen leaves one shot in the face. Things seem cut and dry until Lt. Kenda realizes the “victim” could actually be the aggressor, shot struggling over his own gun.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Death Rains Down
programme.desc: Restaurant worker Sharon Coleman is murdered in a hail of large caliber gunfire. Kenda must break through a web of lies to hunt down one of the most dangerous criminal masterminds he’s ever faced.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Blood Red Highway
programme.desc: The elderly owners of a local grocery are attacked and left for dead. Working with a vague witness description, Lt. Joe Kenda leads a state-wide manhunt to catch a pair of cold-blooded killers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Fate Worst Than Death
programme.desc: At the bottom of a steep ravine, joggers discover a body mutilated beyond recognition. To catch a ruthless maniac, Lt. Joe Kenda must first solve the puzzle of the victim’s identity.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Master Key
programme.desc: When a pregnant mother and her two young sons are brutally slain, pressure mounts for the CSPD to catch the cold-blooded monster who did it.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Duke & Lulu, and Sparky
programme.desc: Cesar heads to the dog park to help some frustrated dog lovers. A therapeutic terrier helps AJ control her panic attacks but tends to attack other dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Joe, and Penny, Roxy, Rico, Lou, & Solomon, and Promise
programme.desc: An Australian shepherd is so devoted to his owner that he breaks leashes to be with her; a neurotic beagle makes trouble for a pack of foster dogs; and an Italian mastiff puppy fears riding in cars.
programme.sub-title: Joe, and Penny, Roxy, Rico, Lou, & Solomon, and Promise

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: High Anxiety
programme.desc: A Pointer mix is fixated on pinecones, while an Australian shepherd whines every time his owner switches on the vacuum cleaner. Can Cesar help?

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Hyde & Vada and Nacho
programme.desc: Hyde and Vada, both wolf hybrids have aggression issues to work out especially when it comes to other dogs. Nacho, bit a child, and shows aggression when he has his toy.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Bullying Bulldog
programme.desc: Bulldog Buster is prone to biting and growling. Sadie, a 3 month old Beagle/terrier mix, is frightened of trash cans. Lacey develops anxiety at 11 years of age.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Pasha, Cosmo, and Contessa
programme.desc: Pasha lashes out at people, especially children. Cosmo’s bitten several people including the postman. Contessa is highly aggressive towards TV shows, especially Dog Whisperer.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Dexter and Nasir
programme.desc: A Chicago art teacher wants to unify her adopted Rottweiler/shepherd’s dual personality. Singer Patti LaBelle is afraid of her guard dog, an aggressive 150-pound South African boerboel.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Gas Sniffer/Teddy Bear Obsession
programme.desc: For more than 30 years, Theresa has been addicted to smelling gasoline. Meanwhile, former drug-addict Krista has 12 'children' -- all of which are teddy bears.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to Inflatables/Butt Injection Addict
programme.desc: Mark has been addicted to his 15 inflatable pool toys, eating with them, sleeping with them and even bathing them. Karmello has been getting black market butt injections for the last three years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Dirt/Extreme Toenails
programme.desc: Kristie has eaten dirt every day for the last 30 years, consuming more than five tons since her addiction began. Meanwhile, Ayanna is addicted to growing her toenails.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Cleanser/Tanner
programme.desc: Ever since she was twelve Crystle has been obsessed with eating household cleanser. Samantha is addicted to tanning and visits multiple tanning salons in order to get her fix.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: My Crazy Obsession Christmas Spcl 1
programme.desc: My Crazy Obsession: Christmas Collection takes you inside the lives of extreme collectors who have taken holiday decorating to the max. For these obsessed collectors, it's Christmas year round.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Love Bunnies_ World's Strongest Family
programme.desc: The Best family is so obsessed with their own strength that they spend countless hours lifting weights. Candace and Steve's collection of bunny items has reached nearly 30,000 pieces.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Raggedy Ann_A Rat's Tale
programme.desc: Chantal’s 19 pet rats are more than just pets; she considers them her children. Robyn loves to share her obsession with Raggedy Ann and she tries to convert new Raggedy believers.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: 5,000 Kids_Tickled Pink
programme.desc: Pat and Joe are passionate about their extreme collection of over 5,000 infamous kid dolls. Kitty Kay Sera is completely obsessed with the color pink. She even wears pink clothes and eats pink food.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Ventriloquist/Cat Lady
programme.desc: April's addiction to her puppets has gotten so strong she can't go anywhere without them. Debbie is severely allergic to cats, but has over twenty of them, leaving her in isolation.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Detergent/Strongman
programme.desc: 19-year-old Tempestt eats detergent up to seven times a day, not to mention the soap she eats in the shower. Meanwhile, Jeff is addicted to strongman competitions training up to six hours a day.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to Coffee Enemas/Licks Cats
programme.desc: Trina and her husband Mike have done nearly 7,000 coffee enemas over the last two and a half years. Lisa has been addicted to licking her cat and eating clumps of its hair for three years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Loves Baby Wipes/Eats Sand
programme.desc: Riah has been addicted to baby wipes since she was 15 and goes through up to 500 every day. Brea has been addicted to eating sand for the past 5 years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Vapor Rubs/Eats Tires
programme.desc: Danielle has been addicted to vapor rub for more than twenty years, going through more than 30 jars, inhalers and patches every week. Allison has been eating tires for the past six years.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: The Lamb/Eats Deodorant
programme.desc: Nicole has been addicted to eating deodorant for two years, consuming fifteen sticks per month. 27-year-old Audrey can't live without her stuffed lamb.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Life On A Mountain
programme.desc: Russ and Dana search for a home in the town of Girdwood, Alaska, at the base of towering Mount Alyeska. The views are spectacular, but the danger of an avalanches is real.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Guys Getaway
programme.desc: David Parks and Chris Erickson are best friends, and professional handymen. They want to buy a weekend getaway house in the wilds of Alaska, but they don’t want to spend a lot of money.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Juneau Waterfront
programme.desc: Chris and Heidi are marine adventurers who want Alaska’s marine wildlife right out their front door. They want to buy a home on the coveted waterfront of the oceanside city of Juneau.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Tiny Homes, Big Mountain
programme.desc: Pete and Martha have lived and worked in some of the wildest locations in the U.S. In Alaska they want an isolated home with views of the tallest peak in North America - Mount McKinley.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Dollars Or Drains
programme.desc: Texas native Colby wants an affordable home, but he’s in for a shock because, in Alaska, that means a dry cabin – with no running water. He doesn’t know anything about life without plumbing.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Dangerous Trails
programme.desc: Brandon and Hanna want a home on an isolated lake far into the Alaskan wild, where there’s no way in but off-roading through trails of mud or landing on water.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: No Roads In
programme.desc: Dave and Wendy want a remote cabin where they can escape to the Alaskan frontier way of life, places so hidden that the only way there is by off-road vehicle and no outhouse is safe from hungry bears.

programme.title: Buying Alaska: Jaws, Claws & Beaver Fever
programme.desc: Shane and Erica want a home in the Alaskan wild, where it’s so remote, the only way in is by a monster 8-wheeler. Homeowners beware! Bears attack the properties and beavers infect the drinking water.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Hot Tubs and Gators
programme.desc: Duck, Lathan, & Flip are tired of traveling each weekend to their favorite place to enjoy bayou living. They’re willing to do anything to buy a home if they can hunt gators right out their back door.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Lakes for the Champ
programme.desc: “Catfish” Jack Clampit and his daughter, Amanda, love hand-grabbing catfish, so he and Amanda are searching for a camp that will accommodate both their families…and their appetite for catfish.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Starter Homes
programme.desc: Josh McIntire is an avid duck hunter and fisherman and he hopes to find a house where he can do just that. He’s bringing his life-long best friend, Hanna, for guidance.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Rolling on the River
programme.desc: Bryan Fassbender and Stephanie Robichaux are self described work-a-holics who just want to have a weekend houseboat on the Pearl River, and are willing to live off the grid.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Boaters Beware
programme.desc: Matt and Laurie aren’t your ordinary couple looking for a turnkey home. They love fixing places up. They look at three unusual homes on Louisiana oxbows.

programme.title: Buying Bayou: Storm Deals
programme.desc: David and Jackie love bayou life in Mississippi. With their two sons away at college, they’re looking to downsize on the water. They’re looking for a fixer upper they can make their own.

programme.title: Baywatch: The Big Blue
programme.desc: Mitch tries to reunite an Army parachutist with her estranged Naval-officer father, while Cody helps a beautiful woman try to reach record-setting depths at a national free-diving competition.

programme.title: Baywatch: Come Fly with Me
programme.desc: After he tries to save Tanner from his abusive father, Mitch ends up on the wrong side of the law. Meanwhile, Jessie's irresistible charm makes a stunt pilot's heart take flight.

programme.title: Baywatch: Boys will be Boys
programme.desc: When caught up in a high-risk adventure at sea, Craig tells Mitch a shocking secret. Meanwhile, Jessie works to creatively end JD and Cody's rivalry during a beachside triathlon, and April comes clean with Manny.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Grand Prix
programme.desc: Mitch feels the need for speed when Tanner's cousin, Damon Lusk, a race car driver in town for a major competition, visits Baywatch. Meanwhile, Newmie and the gang develop a TV show about lifeguards that they try to sell it into syndication.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Down Under, Part 1
programme.desc: After Mitch's lifeguard buddy's ex-wife dies in Australia, Mitch and the team accompany him on a trip down under to meet the son he's never known.

programme.title: Baywatch: Baywatch Down Under, Part 2
programme.desc: While team Baywatch prepares to compete against the Australian guards, Jake must choose between staying down under with his son or returning home. The competing lifeguards must put their intense rivalry aside to save a life.

programme.title: Baywatch: Water Dance
programme.desc: Cody learns a lesson in love when he and Mitch help a troubled violinist escape her dangerously overbearing mentor with a secret agenda. Meanwhile, Alex sets out to prove her worth at Baywatch by retaking the grueling rookie test with Jessie.

programme.title: Baywatch: Double Jeopardy
programme.desc: Alex tries to save a diamond smuggler whose partners want him to "sleep with the fishes." Neely makes Hobie a tempting offer that divides the Buchannon household.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8118
programme.desc: Brooke confides in Bill her trepidation about Thomas and the two reflect upon his shady past. The secret of baby Beth spirals out of control before taking a deadly turn.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8119
programme.desc: Ridge and Brooke’s relationship is put to the test when they learn the distressing news of an untimely death. Pam gives a suspicious Brooke a clue about what may have happened leading up to the tragedy.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8120
programme.desc: The Forresters, Logans, Spencers, Spectras and Avants gather together to mourn one of their own. Quinn, Eric, Steffy and Hope share poignant memories and comfort one another during a difficult time.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8121
programme.desc: Thomas calls upon his friend Vincent to assist in his plan to make Hope his own. With Hope in the middle, Brooke and Ridge take opposing viewpoints on her immediate future.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8122
programme.desc: Thomas panics when Hope breaks down and begins to call Phoebe Beth. Given the events that have recently transpired, Wyatt makes a big life decision.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8123
programme.desc: Wyatt and Flo celebrate their relationship and their decision to take it to the next level. Thomas drugs Liam and then uses his erratic behavior to his advantage with Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8124
programme.desc: Upon awakening, Liam remembers how he pushed Hope away and pulled Steffy closer. Satisfied by his manipulation of Liam, Thomas shares his next plan with Douglas.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8125
programme.desc: Liam confesses to a heartbroken Hope about his night with Steffy. Steffy calls Thomas out for wanting to end Liam and Hope’s relationship.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8126
programme.desc: Thomas convinces Douglas to propose to Hope as if it were his own idea. Steffy does her best to comfort Liam as he recalls his last Fourth of July with Hope.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8127
programme.desc: Douglas asks a bewildered Hope to marry Thomas and be his new mommy. Fearing that Thomas is hiding something, Xander goes to Charlie for a favor.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8128
programme.desc: Thomas manipulates Hope into accepting his proposal. Xander increases his pursuit for evidence against Thomas.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8129
programme.desc: Zoe shocks Xander by defending Thomas from Xander’s slanderous accusations. Liam is stunned by the news of Thomas and Hope’s engagement.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8130
programme.desc: Xander puts his life in danger and confronts Thomas about the murder of Emma. Liam expresses his true love for Hope in anticipation that she will change her mind.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8131
programme.desc: Zoe and Xander’s relationship is on the line when Xander issues Zoe an ultimatum. Brooke does everything in her power to keep Hope from marrying Thomas.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8132
programme.desc: Sally makes Flo run errands at Forrester so she can be alone with Wyatt. Thomas plays a trick on Hope to get her to move up the wedding date.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8133
programme.desc: Ridge makes a large request of Brooke in regards to Thomas. Thomas’ trickery of Douglas causes Hope to make a flash decision.

programme.title: The Bold and the Beautiful: 8134
programme.desc: Liam struggles when Hope announces her updated plans to marry Thomas. Emotions run high as Hope and Thomas ask family and friends to be a part of their ceremony.

programme.title: Elvira's Movie Macabre: Frankenstein's Castle of Freaks
programme.desc: When a Neanderthal man is lynched by villagers, Count Frankenstein (Rossano Brazzi) uses his years of research to bring the monster back to life. (1984)
programme.sub-title: Elvira's Movie Macabre Frankenstein's Castle of Freaks (1984)

programme.title: House on Haunted Hill
programme.desc: A millionaire offers $10,000 to five people who agree to be locked in a large, spooky, rented house overnight with him and his wife.

programme.title: The Last Man on Earth
programme.desc: When a disease turns all of humanity into the living dead, the last man on earth becomes a reluctant vampire hunter.

programme.title: Incident in a Ghostland
programme.desc: When Beth receives a call from her sister Vera, apparently in a state of extreme distress, she is prompted to return to her isolated family home...

programme.title: Halloween
programme.desc: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again. Starring: Donald Pleasence, Jamie Lee Curtis, Tony Moran

programme.title: Rise of the Great White Shark
programme.desc: The Great White Shark. How did it become one of the world's most dominant predators? With spectacular footage and animations, Rise of the Great White Shark takes an in depth look into the specific events and adaptations that help sharks dominate the sea.

programme.title: Countdown to Catastrophe: Storms
programme.desc: What impact do hurricanes make on the global climate? Geophysicist Shimon Wdowinski from the University of Miami has discovered a truly astonishing connection: major storms can trigger massive earthquakes.

programme.title: Mystical Volcano of Indonesia: Kawah Ijen
programme.desc: Kawah Ijen volcano, in East Java, Indonesia, is home to the largest acid crater lake on Earth. Photographer Olivier Grunewald and Vulcanologist Regis Etienne spend 30 nights in the crater to capture a unique and stunning volcanic event.
programme.sub-title: Mystical Volcano of Indonesia: Kawah Ijen (2014)

programme.title: Java in Jeopardy
programme.desc: In the past hundred years, Merapi has claimed over 1,500 victims. Scientists regard it as one of the most dangerous volcanoes in the world. The risk of another serious eruption is high and its consequences would be felt globally.

programme.title: Danger Zone
programme.desc: Host Arglit Boonyai visits Jolo in Mindanao. Its known as the 'kidnap capital' of the Philippines because of the presence of Abu Sayyaf rebels.

programme.title: Danger Zone
programme.desc: Could development be the latest obstacle to peace in fast changing Myanmar?The Shan State Human Rights Foundation alleges that the Myanmar military breached a ceasefire. This time it's not about ethnic identity or autonomy.

programme.title: Danger Zone
programme.desc: Jerusalem and the West Bank. Arguably, the world's most controversial piece of land. Meet the different parties on both sides, try to shed a bit of light on this ongoing conflict and its implications on the daily life of the people living in this region.

programme.title: Countdown to Catastrophe: Volcanoes
programme.desc: Mount Nyiragongo stands an altitude of 3500 meters with lava that boils at 1000

programme.title: Human Prey: Killer Canines and Felines
programme.desc: On a camping trip in the Canadian wilderness, a family is unwittingly stalked by a hungry and opportunistic wolf. A mountain bike excursion in California becomes a life-and-death struggle when a cyclist is pounced and attacked upon by a 110 pound cougar.

programme.title: Janky Promoters
programme.desc: Two sketchy concert promoters get into hot water when they attempt to book a big-name celebrity hip-hop star.

programme.title: Army of One
programme.desc: ARMY OF ONE is the (mostly) true story of Gary Faulkner (Nicolas Cage), an ex-con, unemployed handyman, and modern day Don Quixote who sets out on the unlikeliest of missions.

programme.title: Janky Promoters
programme.desc: Two sketchy concert promoters get into hot water when they attempt to book a big-name celebrity hip-hop star.

programme.title: Let Go
programme.desc: Featuring the king of comedy Kevin Hart, this hilarious, unconventional and heartfelt journey is all about love, loss and other felonies! Discontent parole officer Walter is struggling with the humdrums of married life.

programme.title: Beginning of the End
programme.desc: A swarm of giant grasshoppers, inadvertently created by a radioactive experiment, heads for Chicago.

programme.title: The Castle of Fu Manchu
programme.desc: The Castle of Fu Manchu tries to conquer the world by turning all water into ice.

programme.title: Mystery Science Theater 3000: The Killer Shrews
programme.desc: An experiment on a remote island goes awfully awry when Professor Marlowe Cragis and his research team accidentally create giant, venomous shrews.

programme.title: Red Zone Cuba
programme.desc: An escaped convict and his two pals take part in the Bay of Pigs invasion, then return home with a plan to get rich.

programme.title: Wonder Women
programme.desc: A fiendish supervillain is kidnapping star jai alai players in order to harvest their organs! Even more shocking, someone pitched that plot to a Hollywood executive and they said Yes, we'll make that movie!

programme.title: Three Riffer Edition: Missile to the Moon
programme.desc: More than a decade before Neil Armstrong, Buzz Aldrin and The Other Guy actually landed on the moon, Missile to the Moon made giant leaps for both man AND mankind with its daring portrayal of how the first lunar voyage might play out

programme.title: Reefer Madness - Three Riffer Edition: Reefer Madness: Three Riffer Edition!
programme.desc: Yes, Reefer Madness let the world know that even a single dose of marijuana caused insane laughter, enhanced skill at ragtime piano, the inability to avoid hitting old men with your car, and defenestration.

programme.title: RiffTrax: The Revenge of Dr X: The Revenge of Dr X
programme.desc: It's a cautionary tale about the limits of science, the corrupting forces of power and of course, mainly about getting Ed Wood involved in your movie. Mike, Kevin and Bill team up to riff the botanical masterwork, The Revenge of Doctor X.

programme.title: RiffTrax: Buffalo Rider: Buffalo Rider
programme.desc: Buffalo Rider: When you really stop and think about it, there are two kinds of movies: movies where rugged men punch mountain lions, and movies where this sadly does not happen.

programme.title: Detentionaire: Jock'n Roll High School
programme.desc: Lee goes undercover for football try-outs to try to match up the hand on a photo that belongs to someone who messed with his bag during the prank.

programme.title: Detentionaire: Skate or Die
programme.desc: Lee discovers the Skaters want to use the same paint used in "the prank" in a new practical joke that might affect Tina. Now he has to find out why they have it and try to stop them.

programme.title: Detentionaire: Math Math Revolution
programme.desc: Lee revisits his past as a Mathlete when he gets Holger to infiltrate them to find out if they sent an email to the Skaters. When Holger gets captured, Lee has to escape detention to rescue him.

programme.title: Detentionaire: Friday Night Bites
programme.desc: When Brandy convinces Lee to come to her party, he has to sneak out. Determined to have fun, Cam runs interference so Lee can spend time with Tina, while Kimmie constantly nags Brandy.

programme.title: Detentionaire: Dudes of Darkness
programme.desc: When Lee investigates whether the DoD created the song that played during the prank, he breaks the band up. Now he has to get them back together while finding out what they know.

programme.title: Detentionaire: 28 Sneezes Later
programme.desc: When a flu hits A. Nigma High, Barrage puts the place into lockdown while a sickly, hallucinating Lee finds more than he bargained for when he gets lost in the underground tunnel system.

programme.title: Detentionaire: Disco History Times
programme.desc: The person who set Lee up starts to make direct contact with him via email. When Lee suspects it's someone in the school play, he's forced to juggle the play's lead role with detention duty.

programme.title: Detentionaire: 15th Graders
programme.desc: A sequence of numbers on Lee's phone leads him to a locker on Grade 15er turf where he finds his original bag. But to get it he has to face off with the most feared clique in school.

programme.title: Detentionaire: Welcome to Factory Island
programme.desc: When the school gets overrun with frogs on dissection day, the 10th Grade go on a trip to a Green Apple Splat Factory. When a melt-down occurs, Lee and a few others get trapped inside.

programme.title: Dragon Booster: The Choosing (Part 1)
programme.desc: Avid video game designer Artha Penn has no interest in racing real dragons until a legendary black-and-gold dragon named Beau chooses him to be the Dragon Booster.

programme.desc: A man who has made a new life for himself and the daughter left on his doorstep 6 years ago finds his family threatened when the birth mother resurfaces. Starring: Eugenio Derbez, Karla Souza, Jessica Lindsey.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Invisible Claw
programme.desc: Sulpha, Ming's dragon scientist, creates an army of invisible Rock People to conquer a peaceful desert kingdom. Can Flash stop them?

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Pit of the Tigrons
programme.desc: While Ming is away, Aura takes command of Mongo. She offers a truce if Flash will agree to marry her and rule Mongo at her side.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Cry of the Pantheron
programme.desc: Kobalt the mercenary pretends to fall in love with Thundar, raising Flash's suspicions when he joins an attack on Ming's bomb factory.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Dragon Strikes
programme.desc: Flash, Dale and Dr. Zarkov discover Mango's legendary lost Hall of Science. Surprisingly, Sulpha helps keep the secret from Ming.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Wrath of Ming
programme.desc: Believing that Ming has lost his mind, Aura and Kayla hatch separate plots to overthrow Ming and take the throne of Mongo.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Rocket to Oblivion
programme.desc: Flash, Dale and Dr. Zarkov set off for Earth in an experimental space ship, unaware that Sulpha has hidden a bomb in the ship.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Ambush in Arboria
programme.desc: Dale joins forces with one of Ming's loyal supporters, handsome Prince Barin of Arboria. Is Dale betraying Flash and the rebellion?

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Moon of Mystery
programme.desc: Flash and Aura form an uneasy alliance to protect the peaceful inhabitants of a previously undiscovered moon from Ming's wrath.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Revenge of the Dragon!
programme.desc: Sulpha finds a cache of what seem to be dragon eggs, and asks Flash to stall Ming while she searches for the secret to her lost race.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Fiendish Experiment!
programme.desc: Zarkov literally loses his mind in a dangerous Dynacrystal experiment, enabling Ming to lure Flash and Dale into a deadly trap.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: The Dungeons of Despair!
programme.desc: Ming throws Lynch in jail, but his replacement performs so well that Flash, Aura and Barin trick Ming getting Lynch back.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Treasure of the Depths!
programme.desc: Talon discovers Ming's powerful energy source, a priceless hoard of Dynacrystals hidden deep in a mountain lake.

programme.title: Flash Gordon: New Adventures: Fortress of Fear!
programme.desc: Ming prepares to attack King Vultan of the Hawk People. It's up to Flash and Talon to keep Hawk City from being blown from the sky.

programme.title: Archie's Weird Mysteries: Attack of the Killer Spuds
programme.desc: An alien invasion turns Riverdale teenagers into zonedout couch potatoes, while sentient space potatoes mutate to replace them as vegetable zombies.

programme.title: Archie's Weird Mysteries: Me Me Me!
programme.desc: Reluctantly preparing donations to the local museum for her father, whiny and selfcentered Veronica gets a taste of her own medicine when she wishes that everyone be like me.

programme.title: Archie's Weird Mysteries: Driven to Distraction
programme.desc: Archie buys a pair of mystical fuzzy dice for his beloved car, Betsy, and unwittingly brings her to life when he hangs the dice on her rearview mirror.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: Supersized Alyson Mawunga swaps her colossal portions and sugary snacks with superskinny Nick Wood, who lives off caffeine drinks and little else.

programme.title: Supersize Vs Superskinny
programme.desc: At just 6 stone 10lbs, 19 year old Tatiana Moxfis extremely underweight and desperate for people to stop asking her if she's got an eating disorder

programme.title: Addicted to Food: Sharon's Story
programme.desc: This is the tragic story of Sharon Mevsimler, a 45 stone woman who had a life saving operation – and then starved herself to death at the age of 41.

programme.title: Sex Party 101
programme.desc: What exactly happens at a sex club? Ever attended? Been invited but got cold feet? Sex Party 101 dives in with a handful of sexperts to get the down and dirty as well as the etiquette of varying sex parties.

programme.title: Danger: Teen Bingers
programme.desc: This shocking documentary focuses on young teenagers who are underage and overweight, and the life-threatening health dangers they are exposing themselves to through binge eating.

programme.title: Russell Brand: End The Drugs War
programme.desc: In this personal journey for BBC Three, Russell Brand sets out to find out how other countries are tackling their problems of drug abuse and to explore how the framework of criminalization implicit in the 'war on drugs' produces enormous harm.

programme.title: Baby ER
programme.desc: Consultant surgeon Sean Marven, who has been working at the Children's Hospital in Sheffield for ten years, awaits the arrival of a newborn baby with gastroschisis named Sharlene.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander view a cottage in Kent and three-bedroom terrace in Derby.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Derbyshire, Trowbridge and North London.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Canterbury, County Durham and Devon.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy view a four-bedroom house in Tyne and Wear, a detached bungalow in Rochester and a house in Plymouth.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer
programme.desc: Martin and Lucy visit properties in Devon, Gateshead and Peterborough.

programme.title: Homes Under The Hammer: Episode 20
programme.desc: Lucy and Martin travel to Cornwall to see a hotel; will it be faulty towers all over again or a huge money maker? A three bedroom house in Nottingham in a reasonable location; but needs abit of TLC. In Kent a piece of land right on the sea front.

programme.title: New Rose Hotel
programme.desc: Two businessmen are hired to steal secrets from a rival, and decide to use a beautiful, but volatile call girl to do so. Starring: Christopher Walken, Willem Dafoe, Asia Argento

programme.title: Bad Lieutenant
programme.desc: While investigating a young nun's rape, a corrupt New York City police detective, with a serious drug and gambling addiction, tries to change his ways and find forgiveness and redemption. Starring: Harvey Keitel, Brian McElroy, Frank Acciarito

programme.title: An American Werewolf in Paris
programme.desc: An American man unwittingly gets involved with French werewolves who are able to transform at will.

programme.title: Empire Records
programme.desc: A group of young, anti-establishment Gen-X employees fight to save their record store from being overtaken by a conglomerate retail record corporation.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Layers of Thai Flavour
programme.desc: Thai host Palin Congchitnant uses fresh Thai ingredients and flavours to make Smoked Trout Salad and a Kaffir Lime Vodka Martini.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Argentinian Barbeque Favourites
programme.desc: Barbeque is a go-to cooking method in many cultures. Host Natalia Machado grills up delicious Argentinian barbeque favourites like Empanadas.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Spiced up Sauces
programme.desc: Sauce is king in Italian cuisine! Warm host Vanessa Gianfrancesco shows us how to cook three simple Italian sauces.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Versatile Miso
programme.desc: Miso is an extremely common ingredient in Japanese cuisine. Host Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen shows us how miso can add flavour and richness to any dish.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Demystifying Indian Food
programme.desc: Charming host Vijaya Selvaraju demystifies a number of Indian dishes like Dal Soup in a crockpot and Fish in (three-ingredient) Red Chili Chutney.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Thai Sauces
programme.desc: It's all about the sauces as Pailin Chongchitnant shows us how easy and versatile they are in Thai cuisine.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Three Course Argentinian Meal
programme.desc: Warm host Natalia Machado makes a three course Argentinian meal that reminds her of her family.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Stuffed Olives and Risotto
programme.desc: Italian host Vanessa Gianfrancesco whips up classy dishes for a gorgeous dinner party in Italy.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Izakaya Finger Foods
programme.desc: Every culture has its version of finger food and in Japan it’s called Izakaya! Hana Etsuko Dethlefsen prepares tapas dishes perfect for nighttime snacking.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Mangoes, Mangoes, Mangoes
programme.desc: The key ingredient in this episode of One World Kitchen is mangoes! Host Vijaya Selvaraju uses mangoes for some classic Indian dishes.

programme.title: One World Kitchen: Popular Thai Dishes
programme.desc: Endearing host Pailin Chongchinant makes three popular Thai dishes: Coconut Chicken Soup, Green Papaya Salad, and the most famous, Pad Thai.

programme.title: One World Kitchen Bakes the Holidays
programme.desc: A sweet holiday baking special with a global twist. Easy-to-make recipes from Italy, Argentina, Japan and Thailand that are sure to become part of your family’s holiday tradition.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Vanilla and Vinegar
programme.desc: Vanilla and vinegar in one dish? Chef Lauren Gulyas takes on the creative challenge of combining the unlikely pair in a delicious mashup.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Bacon and Bananas
programme.desc: Chef Robert Jewell plays with the flavours of bacon and bananas, making dishes with each ingredient before combining them in a fun, quirky dish.

programme.title: A is for Apple: Rapini and Raspberry
programme.desc: Chef Leah Wildman must work with the flavours of rapini and raspberry, and is challenged to combine the two ingredients in an imaginative final dish.

programme.title: Hunter: On Air

programme.title: Hunter: Shillelagh

programme.title: Hunter: The Legion of Hate - Part 2
programme.desc: Hunter defies departmental policy to save McCall from a kidnapper and bring her back to the police force.

programme.title: The FBI Files
programme.desc: In 1984, a tragic murder led agents into the frightening world of domestic terrorism. Law enforcement vowed to dismantle the violent faction that claimed responsibility.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Dishonored
programme.desc: Shirley Russell was determined enough to reach the rank of Captain in the United States Marine Corps. When this officer turned up missing, her colleagues refused to believe she had gone AWOL. It was unclear whether Captain Shirley Russell was alive.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Deadly Threat
programme.desc: A suspected drug dealer would stop at nothing to keep local and federal authorities from building a case against him. When his organization started targeting the government itself, federal agencies went on high alert.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Killer Abroad
programme.desc: Beginning in 1990, Europe found itself in the clutches of a serial killer. He became an international outlaw, hopping from country to country to evade capture and to kill again.

programme.title: The FBI Files: The Search For Lisa Rene
programme.desc: When a young woman was grabbed from her Texas home, the police raced to find her abductors. On the face of it, the kidnapping seemed like the random act of desperate men.

programme.title: The FBI Files: When Seconds Count
programme.desc: On July 2nd 1994, a 12-year-old girl was abducted from her home in northern California. The FBI knows to act fast, search wide, enlist volunteers. But as the hours slipped by, agents also realized their chances for recovering her alive grew slim.

programme.title: The FBI Files: Dead Run
programme.desc: In Pennsylvania, an inmate escaped with the help of his female accomplice. Following a trail of fraudulent credit card receipts and deaths, authorities track the pair, but always find themselves one step behind.

programme.title: The Best Of Laurel And Hardy

programme.title: Notorious Women Of The Bible: Eve – The Original Rebel

programme.title: Notorious Women Of The Bible: Bathsheba – Wife, Mother, Queen

programme.title: Notorious Women Of The Bible: Jezebel – The Ultimate Bad Girl

programme.title: Notorious Women Of The Bible: Esther – A Clever Heroine

programme.title: The Berlin Wall: Escape To Freedom
programme.desc: A tyrannical regime builds a monstrous concrete slab that severs a city – the Berlin Wall. On the Western side, it’s a hated symbol of a bitter Cold War, on the East, a deadly blockade to freedom.

programme.title: The Hunt For Transylvanian Gold

programme.title: Final 24

programme.title: Final 24

programme.desc: The competition heads South this week in search of Dixieland’s top dog. While Georgia may be known for peaches, after seeing the crop of pooches in this land, they should be the “Puppy” state!

programme.title: America's Cutest Puppies: Boston, MA
programme.desc: The puppies are coming! The puppies are coming! Freezing temperatures can’t keep these Bostonians and their pups away. No matter how cold the weather, the puppies are all “Cheers” and by the end of the day everyone will know their name!

programme.title: America's Cutest Puppies: New York, NY
programme.desc: If these puppies can make it here, they can make it anywhere! Here in the Big Apple the pooches are dogged, audacious and will steal your heart in a New York minute!

programme.title: America's Cutest Puppies: Chicago, IL
programme.desc: Chicago may be the known as the “Windy City” and true to style, these dogs will blow you away! Puggles and poodles and “All that Jazz” make up this pool of playful pooches.

programme.title: America's Cutest Puppies: Miami, FL
programme.desc: Miami may be known as the land of beautiful people, but it’s also the land of beautiful puppies! Look out South Beach – Hurricane CutePuppy is coming at full force and about to knock the flip-flops off these judges!

programme.title: America's Cutest Puppies: Grand Finale
programme.desc: After searching the country and sniffing out hundreds of dogs, the ultimate competition has arrived. The ten regional winners from each city have made it out to L.A. to compete for the first-ever title of “America’s Cutest Puppy” and grand prize.

programme.title: Beware of Dog: Bark Bark
programme.desc: Beware of Dog! These fails show us once again why dogs are man's best friends.

programme.title: Curious And Unusual Deaths: Episode 2: At Home
programme.desc: A pet lover falls into a cat dish filled with less than three-inches of water, an impatient man finds a way to make his Lava Lamp work faster, and a brick-layer is provoked to laugh for 25 minutes straight – all with fatal results.

programme.title: Curious And Unusual Deaths: Episode 3: In A Contest
programme.desc: Engineering students see who can spit the furthest, a woman places second in a water-drinking competition, and a couple endures 86 hours of holding each other close – all with fatal results.

programme.title: Curious And Unusual Deaths: Episode 4: From The Deep

programme.title: Curious And Unusual Deaths: Episode 5: Against The Clock
programme.desc: An unemployed man plays an on-line video game for 50 hours, two stowaways try to fly to China in a wheel well, and famous whisky man Jack Daniels loses his toe – all with fatal results.

programme.title: Curious And Unusual Deaths: Episode 6: By Their Own Invention
programme.desc: A hoarder booby-traps his brownstone, a French tailor tests an experimental glider off the Eiffel Tower, and famous scientist, Marie Curie is radiant about her discovery – all with fatal results.

programme.title: Follow Your Nose: The Amazing Science of Smell: Follow Your Nose: The Amazing Science of Smell (2017)

programme.sub-title: Follow Your Nose: The Amazing Science of Smell (2017)

programme.title: How Does That Work?

programme.title: How Does That Work?
programme.desc: This episode dives into some truly massive projects - from an underground experiment where scientists hunt for the so-called "God Particle" to an attempt to find a new supply of electricity.

programme.title: How Does That Work?

programme.title: How Does That Work?

programme.title: How Does That Work?

programme.title: The Big Flip

programme.title: The Big Flip

programme.title: The Big Flip

programme.title: The Big Flip

programme.title: Fertile Floods - Croatia's Wetlands

programme.title: Wild Alpine Rivers - Life in the Extreme
programme.desc: What would happen to the mountains without water? They would turn into deserts, devoid of life and vegetation. But there are very few mountains without water on our planet.

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Cold War & The Start of the Space Race - Cold War rivalry and the acceleration of space exploration. Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.
programme.sub-title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.
programme.sub-title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.
programme.sub-title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.
programme.sub-title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.
programme.sub-title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.
programme.sub-title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.
programme.sub-title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
programme.desc: To the Moon - The Apollo program achieves its major objective. Dragon, Falcon and Spacex - New directions in re-usable spacecraft. Gaia- Mapping our galaxy in unprecedented detail.
programme.sub-title: To The Moon, SpaceX's Dragon and Falcon & GAIA

programme.title: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration
