programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Year of the Dog
programme.desc: A one-hour special that looks back at 2006, one of Dog's most tumultuous years, which has included the passing of Beth's father, Dog and Beth's wedding, the tragic death of Dog's daughter Barbara.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Mystery of Mona Lisa
programme.desc: When Lyssa points out that the fugitive in the next case has the same birth date as Barbara, Dog's recently deceased daughter, the team takes a special vow to capture the young woman.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Rusty Cuffs
programme.desc: Dog finds himself fighting two enemies; the law and his inner demons. He continues his legal battle to fight extradition to Mexico in connection with his 2003 capture of fugitive rapist Andrew Luster. His other struggle is private.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Make a Wish
programme.desc: Dog shows his love of justice and children in this poignant episode. He begins by giving encouragement to a group of handicapped children, then starting the search for Jacob, a fugitive who's abandoned his wife and children.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Tough Love
programme.desc: Michael is out on bail for drug sales, theft, and violation of parole. Dog's after him for failing to appear in court and his only lead is Jen, his co-signer and girlfriend.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Surprise Ending
programme.desc: Dog and the boys are going after a fugitive with a $25,000 bond and a string of theft charges behind him. When the team hits his apartment, they find a boot print on the door, a souvenir of a police raid from only days earlier?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Big Wipe-Out
programme.desc: A Hawaiian surfing hero is on a wave to nowhere and it's Dog's turn to play lifeguard. "Buttons," known throughout the islands for his prowess on the waves and his daring 360's, has wiped-out on the rocky shoals of drug addiction.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: You Can Bet On It!
programme.desc: Kristine had a string of gambling and forgery charges before she jumped bail leaving Dog "holding the bag". Now it's time for Dog to call in some chits of his own, getting the help of trusty informants he's helped out over the years.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fly Boy
programme.desc: Dog told him not to go, but Charles went anyway, skipping to Oregon against the terms of his bail. Now Dog has a tip that Charles plans to slip back into Honolulu. With $30,000 on the line Dog knows he can leave little to chance.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Guns & Ice
programme.desc: The following day is Dog's birthday but that won't stop him from chasing a fugitive, who is facing firearms charges. Dog doesn't relish the thought of going after an alleged gunslinger on his birthday but he's never one to avoid a challenge.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: The Good Fight
programme.desc: Dog and Beth have to be at the state capitol bright and early to receive an award for their fight against ice in Hawaii. Afterwards, they're inspired to start the hunt for Shanna, an alleged ice user and identity thief with $80,000 in bonds.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Renaissance Men
programme.desc: When the Robertsons throw a Renaissance Fair birthday party for Godwin, various family members compete in a tournament to win knighthood.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Heroes Welcome
programme.desc: In this special episode, the Duck Commander team surprises two wounded veterans with a trip to Monroe so they can be in an episode of Duck Dynasty. To show their support, the Robertson family stages a color run to bring awareness to our wounded soldiers.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Pie Hard
programme.desc: Willie and Alan agree to help Miss Kay open her own bakery, but things take a turn when Kay is asked to hand over her secret recipes. Meanwhile, the guys in the duck call room take an extended lunch break by driving to Mississippi.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Van He'llsing
programme.desc: When Missy and Jase's son Reed purchases an old van to boost his music career, his parents begin to question some of his choices. Meanwhile, Willie helps Jep prepare River for a competitive wrestling league by introducing him to his friend.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Toad to Perdition
programme.desc: When Willie and his brothers spend too much time frog hunting, their wives challenge them to a "frogging" competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: RV There Yet?
programme.desc: The Robertson family takes a road trip to Liberty University where they will drop off John Luke and Mary Kate for their first year of college. Along the way, they stop in Nashville to visit Willie's friend Colt Ford.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Willie & Korie's Anniversorry
programme.desc: The Robertson family throws a party for Willie & Korie's 25th anniversary, but things take a dramatic turn when Willie and Korie reveal a big secret. Meanwhile, when Jase blames Uncle Si for getting him a parking ticket.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Statue of Imitations
programme.desc: When Willie asks a local chainsaw artist to make him a statue, he gets a big surprise when it's revealed that the statue is of an unlikely subject - Willie himself. Meanwhile, Jep and Jessica attempt to help Kay with her hoarding.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Decent Proposal
programme.desc: On a trip to New York, Jase's son Reed proposes to his girlfriend, which inspires his father to fan the flames of romance back home with Missy. Meanwhile, Sadie asks Willie to be a guest lecturer at her business class.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Father Knows Pest
programme.desc: The tables are turned when the HOA comes to Jase for help to rid the neighborhood of a menacing beaver. Little Will has just gotten his learner's permit, and Willie and Si argue over which of them is the better driving instructor.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Wild Wild West Monroe
programme.desc: When Jase and Jep get into an argument over which of them is the rightful heir to their grandfather's old rifle, they decide to settle the argument with a marksmanship contest. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie help Rebecca prepare for her trip to Taiwan.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Half in the Bag
programme.desc: After Si has started moonlighting as a grocery bagger, the guys show up at the store and their teasing inadvertently causes Si to lose his job and his chance to enter a local bagging competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: There Will Be Flood
programme.desc: When a large storm hits Monroe, most of the adults head to Phil and Kay's to help protect their house from flooding while Jess, Sadie, Rebecca and Cole babysit the kids. Meanwhile, Jep, Si, Martin and Godwin try to protect the Duck Commander.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Bingo Star
programme.desc: Willie accompanies Kay to a local bingo tournament and gets seduced by the game, eventually embarrassing himself and Kay with his enthusiasm.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Sadie's Choice
programme.desc: Willie takes Sadie on a tour of a local college in hopes of convincing her to stay nearby after her impending high school graduation.

programme.title: Ax Men: Swamp Man Boogie
programme.desc: Deep in the Bayou, Shelby hits Lake Ponchartrain with Belinda and Bob to retrieve a massive log he marked years ago. In Florida, it's round two between Chapman and the legendary Gump log.

programme.title: Ax Men: Teepee of Death
programme.desc: In Washington, Rygaard's remaining veterans go old school to keep the team on track. Deep in the Bayou, Shelby and Bob discover a valuable sinker cypress, but reeling it in is easier said then done.

programme.title: Ax Men: Old Log New Tricks
programme.desc: In the Louisiana Bayou, Shelby Stanga's jet boat is in desperate need of repair and he needs to find logs to buy a new engine.

programme.title: Ax Men: All's Fair in Loggin' War
programme.desc: Down in the swamps of Louisiana, Shelby Stanga is trying to upgrade his logging empire, so he takes a risk and tries out some new equipment.

programme.title: Ax Men: Don't Cross The Boss
programme.desc: In the Pacific Northwest, Rygaard logging has begun to claw its way back up the log count thanks to DJ Jeremiah, but today he's a no show.

programme.title: Ax Men: Davi and Goliath
programme.desc: Shelby Stanga is still without his jet boat, but fortunately he has his trusty assistant Davi and his Go-Devil to pick up the slack.

programme.title: Ax Men: Jet Logged
programme.desc: Shelby gets his jet boat back, and it now has a new five hundred horsepower engine that will help him get the job done.

programme.title: Ax Men: Log Runners
programme.desc: The battle for King of The Mountain rages on between the big boys of the Pacific Northwest. In Washington, the Rygaard crew has a problem with getting the wood to the mill, so Gabe's bringing in a trucking ace to get the job done.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: A Pudding Proposal
programme.desc: This episode features a dynamic duo, duling over a diamond in the rough. He says when the money ran out, so did she. These two are caught between a rock and a hard place.

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Peek-A-Boo Painter
programme.desc: The defendant simply wanted her house painted, and the plaintiff claims, she was out to paint the town. Watch as these colorful litigants stand off!

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: A Pain in My Glass
programme.desc: In this episode, a child's baseball hits issues that seems black and white. What should've been an open and shut case was anything but!

programme.title: Eye for an Eye Series: The Company Cabaret
programme.desc: A former employee complains that her employer turned the workplace into a raunchy club! He claims she was a poor performer, but she says she didn't sign up for this kind of show!

programme.title: Emergency

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: Gasoline on a barbecue grill, now a victim fights to live. 70% of his body is burned and paramedics need to get him to a hospital quickly. Plus, saving a life 35,000 feet in the air.

programme.title: Emergency

programme.title: Emergency

programme.title: Emergency

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A severely injured man is trapped inside an overturned trash truck. Plus, three people aboard a disabled fishing boat need help. And, rushing to save victims in a multi-vehicle crash.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A cabin cruiser is sinking with a father and son on board. Plus, an emergency crew tries to find a man bleeding to death in the desert. And, a pregnant woman is among the victims when a van flips over.

programme.title: Emergency

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A young woman's first parachute jump turns tragic. Plus, caught deep between a narrow crack atop a huge ice glacier. And state-of-the-art technology that helps emergency teams in Iceland.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: A crippled boat with four people on board is being battered by rough seas. Plus, rescue teams try to save stranded whales before it's too late. And, new high tech equipment help emergency teams respond faster.

programme.title: Emergency
programme.desc: Trying to save the life of a suspected drug overdose victim. Plus, a woman is thrown from her car in a multi-vehicle accident during a heavy rainstorm. And, helping a victim who was pepper-sprayed.

programme.title: Emergency

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Long Road
programme.desc: Andi's world is turned upside down when hidden revelations rise to the surface. Karen is in a fight for her life. Sabrina aims to protect the ones she loves. (S1, ep25)

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Louie Louie
programme.desc: Stuck in the house with nothing else to do, a new set of problems arise for Mary Jane when Cece reveals her plans to extort her. Meanwhile, SNC hires Marisol, a new, young replacement. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Sparrow
programme.desc: When Mary Jane gets the devastating news of the death of a loved one, she'll be forced to confront her life choices, deal with her family and face David. (S3, ep3)

programme.title: Being Mary Jane: Sparrow
programme.desc: When Mary Jane gets the devastating news of the death of a loved one, she'll be forced to confront her life choices, deal with her family and face David. (S3, ep3)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: Home For A Queen
programme.desc: The ladies are concerned about Andi and her relationship choice. Sabrina stands strong for all of her friends who seem to be under attack. (S1, ep23)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Yellow Dress
programme.desc: Gary and Jasmine confront each other and the gloves come off. Andi struggles to maintain her career. Karen is confronted by a new enemy. Sabrina grows frustrated. (S1, ep22)

programme.title: Curvy Style with Timothy Snell: Modern Curves
programme.desc: Join Hollywood's hottest curvy stylist, Timothy Snell, as he races to pull off two chic and sophisticated looks, one fit for a Queen…Queen Latifah that is, and the other, a makeover for an Atlanta mom with a serious addiction to leggings.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Practice
programme.desc: Brenda is terrified by a dark hooded figure spotted in her West Virginia home. The same entity allegedly tormented her late husband. PRS and Psychic/Medium Michelle Belanger help Brenda before she slips into the same abyss as her late husband.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Firehouse
programme.desc: Everyone from the chief to the trainees at the Clementon Fire Department is convinced that the ghost of a former member is haunting their firehouse.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Freshmen Fear
programme.desc: A young female student claims to have seen a ghost in her dorm room.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dark Man
programme.desc: A grieving mother suspects her deceased son may have fallen victim to a mysterious entity called The Dark Man.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Spirits of the Slave Dungeon
programme.desc: Ryan books a two-night case in a real haunted jail in Charleston, SC, but PRS soon realizes the spirits themselves are being held there against their will and subjected to an unjust form of torture.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Bedroom Eyes
programme.desc: PRS travels to rural Pennsylvania to investigate a haunting that began after a new couple moved into an old family farm.?Over the next three days, hidden tragedies are uncovered and latent psychic abilities are revealed.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dwelling of the Dead
programme.desc: A single mom claims she is being physically assaulted by a spirit in her Kentucky home. Ryan first explores a natural explanation for the alleged phenomena. But the client's five-year-old son also sees spirits, and his sightings appear to line up.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Shadow Caster
programme.desc: PRS investigates an Alabama home where clients, Georgiana and her two daughters, are so terrified, they moved out after only 18 months. They have seen shadow figures, been touched and have a recorded EVP stating, "Look at me, get out of here."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Devil's Hostage
programme.desc: When a woman has long scratch marks mysteriously appear on her back, PRS is called in to see if they are truly facing the devil. But her credibility is called into question, a struggle of another kind emerges for Ryan and the rest of the team.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Smoke and Shadows
programme.desc: Sarah believes her Parkville, MD home has been invaded by a powerful force ever since her roommate Dennis moved in. PRS investigates claims that Dennis has been attacked by the entity, a possible poltergeist.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Desperate Households
programme.desc: When Julie and her family moved into their dream home in suburban New Jersey they quickly realized they were not alone.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Basement
programme.desc: A history of violence may connect the spiritual activity in Heidi's Ohio home to a long run of misery and cruelty.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Lost Souls
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/medium Michelle Belanger investigate a Pennsylvania home; where a mother named Kathy and her son Michael have both felt the presence of a young boy and hear voices calling, "Mom?" but no one is there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Charleville Forest Castle
programme.desc: Located in the center of Ireland, Charleville Forest Castle is built on the site of an ancient burial ground where plague victims were buried in the 1700s. The team holds a Victorian-style séance.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Michelam Priory
programme.desc: Michelam Priory was originally a church built on a medieval moated island. In 1556 it was transformed into a house where many families have lived through history and tragedy.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Brannigans Nightclub, Manchester
programme.desc: The team investigates reports of considerable poltergeist activity and spectral sighting. They encounter two entities that did not want a television crew in the building, according to Derek.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Tutbury Castle, Staffordshire
programme.desc: Tutbury is an ancient castle steeped in bloody history, which once held Mary, Queen of Scots. During their 24-hour vigil, the team hopes to encounter a ghostly lady and meet historian Lesley Smith.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Station Hotel, Dudley
programme.desc: The team returns to Dudley, this time to investigate the Station Hotel. Since its opening in 1910, the hotel has welcomed many famous guests, but is said to be haunted by the ghost of a murdered maid.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Skirrid Inn, Abergavenny
programme.desc: The oldest pub in Wales has a gruesome history: over 100 people were hanged in the stairwell. After eliminating all natural causes, the crew is convinced that a door is opening and closing on its own.

programme.title: Most Haunted: House of Detention, Clerkenwell, London
programme.desc: Built in 1845, the Clerkenwell House of Detention quickly became London's largest prison, holding 240 prisoners — including children. Derek must cope with hostile spirits and a crew member is injured.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Derby
programme.desc: The Heritage Centre, Lafferty's Pub and the Bell Inn give Derby a claim on the title of "the most haunted city in Europe." The team travels to Derby to investigate this claim.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: The Right Thing
programme.desc: Jonathan inspires a young man to help the grandfather who has recently been placed in a nursing home.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Thoroughbreds - Part 1
programme.desc: Lizzy MacGill is a horse trainer's young daughter who elopes with Garth Armstrong, a privileged man.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Thoroughbreds - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark try to help Lizzie. The new bride has cancer and she is pregnant.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song for Jason - Part 1
programme.desc: Mark and Jonathan become counselors at a camp for children with cancer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: A Song for Jason - Part 2
programme.desc: Jonathan and Mark are helping patients at Camp Good Times in different ways. But a father still refuses to deal with his son's illness.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Bless the Boys in Blue
programme.desc: Jonathan relinquishes his angelic powers for awhile and realizes the dangers that Mark has faced being a police officer.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Cindy
programme.desc: An aspiring actress wants to be accepted for who she really is, not in the image her well-meaning dad tries to transform her into.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: A Budding New Look
programme.desc: When Rose was growing up, she was called "the ugliest girl" at her high school. Even though she is now grown up and has a loving fiancé, those cruel comments from her past still haunt her.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Jason Searell
programme.desc: Jason Searell admits he's let himself go, and he's gone a long way. Jason needs a complete overhaul but can Fiona McDonald and her team of experts really knock off 10 years in just 10 days?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: One Hot Pizza Guy To Go
programme.desc: Frank is a husband and father who has overcome hardships to start a small business of his own. But his decaying teeth give him an unwanted tough guy image because he never smiles. Frank's ready to shed the old image and start fresh.
programme.sub-title: One Hot Pizza Guy To Go

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Duty Calls
programme.desc: Kimberly met her husband in the Air Force. They lived an active lifestyle until his health forced him into a wheelchair. The stress of care giving and years of smoking has caught up to her and it's Kimberly's turn to receive some care.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Hair Today, Gone Tomorrow
programme.desc: Kim is a suburban wife and mother that never shook off the hippie-look of her youth. Now she longs for a more polished and sophisticated image than her long braid and wire-rimmed glasses.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Sue Chamberlain "One Year On"
programme.desc: Just a year ago, Sue Chamberlain was a 34 year old living in a 40 year old's body. Now, a year on, we retrace Sue's transformational journey – and pop in to pay Sue a return visit. Will she still be looking fabulous – or flabby?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Siobhan Wirdman
programme.desc: Step in Nicky Hambleton-Jones to rescue 37 year old Siobhan Wirdman and get this full time wife and mother to love herself and get her life back on track.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Facing the Music
programme.desc: KerriAnn is a Rock n' Roll singer who has recently lost her rhythm. Years of touring with a band and the recent loss of two family members has taken its toll on her looks. Our team of experts is going to try and make KerriAnn look 10 Years Younger.

programme.title: From Frump To Fairy Tale
programme.desc: Postal worker Kimberly is getting married and wants the look of a princess for her fairy tale wedding. She undergoes treatment for her damaged skin and then she's off with the glam squad to get the perfect bridal look.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Arresting A New Look
programme.desc: Mary is a busy police officer, patrolling the streets, chasing criminals and breaking down doors. Our team of experts is going to take Mary into custody and do their magic to make her look 10 Years Younger.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger UK: Liz Okoye
programme.desc: Clean living Liz Okoye from Bournemouth exercises regularly, rarely drinks and doesn't smoke. She thinks she's doing everything right in her quest to look younger: so why did one hundred people put her at 51, when she's only 44?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Back On Track
programme.desc: After going through a recent bout with cancer, Deborah is getting back on track with healthy living. Doctors help reduce her four eyes to two and smooth out a facial scar, and the glam squad performs their magic to help make her look 10 years younger.

programme.title: 10 Years Younger USA: Check My ID, Please!
programme.desc: Celina works in an unglamorous family business, manufacturing industrial degreasers; but dreams of being an actress, despite never auditioning. She turns to our experts for help with her appearance. Will she finally be ready to take center stage?

programme.title: 10 Years Younger New Zealand: Sharyn O’Brien
programme.desc: With a wedding planned and a fiance waiting, primary school teacher Sharyn O'Brien is desperately in need of help. Can Fiona McDonald and her crack team of experts bin Sharyn's bad dye job and reinvent her in just 10 days?

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Scabby Monkey
programme.desc: Contending with overweight cats and their over protective owners was not what Danny Trevanion had in mind when he became a vet. So when a scruffy, barely alive African monkey arrives at his practise Danny is fascinated by the challenge.

programme.title: Wild At Heart
programme.desc: Danny is having second thoughts about the wisdom of uprooting his new family and ploughing all their money into a business venture that they know next to nothing about.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Work To Do
programme.desc: A successful giraffe capture means everyone is in high spirits, until the arrival of Evan and Olivia's real father, Simon, throws the family into turmoil.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Meerly Evan
programme.desc: Evan lets the mischievous meerkats loose in Rosie's room to cause havoc. Rosie is devastated when they destroy an irreplaceable photograph of her mother and rages at Evan. She decides once and for all to go back to Bristol.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Evan Meets Elli
programme.desc: Rogue young male elephants are rampaging through Leopard's Den and destroying everything the family have built, so Danny introduces a matriarch elephant in the hope that she will calm them down.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Dawn Feeling
programme.desc: At a typically rowdy family breakfast, Rosie is excitedly looking forward to the arrival of her friend Izzy, whilst Danny is concerned about the rumour of ivory poachers in the area. Unnoticed, Miranda the lion cub pads off into the bush.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 1
programme.desc: The Trevanions have been living at Leopard's Den for over a year. The wildlife is roaming freely and the family are settled into African way of life. Business however is not good. With an abundance of game lodges competition is fierce.

programme.title: Wild At Heart: Episode 2
programme.desc: It's the grand reopening of Mara and a British wildlife charity is using the event to release a vulture back into the wild. Fatani, the new, young and ambitious manager of Mara has hired Danny as the vet to oversee the release.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 6
programme.desc: The embassy visits a convicted drug dealer in the world's most notorious prison. But Steven claims he's the innocent victim of an undercover drug sting gone wrong.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 7
programme.desc: Young Rhys calls the embassy after his businessman father is arrested and jailed for fraud. Can Rhys raise the bail money to get him out of jail? It's a race against the clock.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 8
programme.desc: Ash contacts the embassy convinced he's going to die after days of partying. The notorious Thai bucket strikes again! The embassy needs to uncover the truth. Is he really in danger or is he suffering from alcohol poisoning?

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 1
programme.desc: Nathan is in Phuket on a holiday of a lifetime, fuelled by sun, sex and steroids, when disaster strikes. 19-year-old Paris is on a gap year adventure of a lifetime. But just two months into her first-ever overseas holiday she's hit a big roadblock.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 2
programme.desc: Retired Army Officer, Ben arrives at the Embassy in tears. His young Thai wife has suddenly gone missing. Rodney has been having way too much of a good time in Vietnam. He's overstayed his visa and run up a $1,500 hotel bill.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 3
programme.desc: Music journalist, Illario the Lothario, is one of many foreign revelers who have come unstuck. His passport is drenched and no longer valid. He arrives to the Embassy, only to fall head over heals for a dashing Thai diplomat.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 4
programme.desc: Best mates Rhys and Benny, are on their first-ever overseas holiday together. They're staying in the heart of Phuket and the sky's the limit. They've done everything their parents warned them not to.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 5
programme.desc: When a massive earthquake strikes Nepal hundreds of traumatised and injured Aussie travellers need to be evacuated to Thailand. 19-year-old Alex from Sydney is in Phuket for a kickboxing holiday with his mates.

programme.title: The Embassy: Episode 6
programme.desc: When disaster strikes, and a ferry sinks off the coast of Krabi carrying 104 passengers the Embassy goes into overdrive. Callum heads to the immigration detention centre to check on the welfare of a serial visa-overstay offender.

programme.title: The Embassy
programme.desc: Queenslander Sam and his German girlfriend Sandra met and fell in love in Thailand. After a long distance relationship, they've finally decided to leave their respective countries and begin a life together in Chiang Mail.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 01
programme.desc: An angry bull, a few English people prepared for the weather and a young, talented race driver - tourists will be venturing down to the infamous 'green hell' of the Nürburgring!

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 02
programme.desc: A tuned-up Golf 2, a family sedan from Hannover, Germany and a very special Porsche GT2! We will be looking behind the scenes of the gas station by the curve on the race track where sports cars flock!

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 03
programme.desc: The Nürburgring has transformed into a winter wonderland, but although it looks pretty it sure is not pretty to use it as a race track.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 04
programme.desc: Fog, rain and snow means that a visit to the Eifel region is not that pleasant right now. Nevertheless, the hardcore drivers are out of the track and are not letting the weather get in their way.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 05
programme.desc: The Nürburgring. Here you can really let your hair down on a spectacular and difficult race track and learn how to get fit for motor sports. That is why motor fans come here to the Nürburgring throughout the year!

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 06
programme.desc: On today's episode, we will be treating you to some very entertaining clips from the Nürburgring. Expect to see the pedal on the metal and rubber burning up the place!

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 07
programme.desc: The weather has cleared up a bit on the Nürburgring and we are finally back on the track. As soon as the snow and ice has gone the horsepower junkies return to the ring to tear it up once again.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 08
programme.desc: On today's show we will be showing you the history of a racing legend who has won the 24-hour race four times in a row: Olaf Manthey. Stick around and perhaps you will find out the secret of his success.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 09
programme.desc: Christian Menzel has asked presenter Miriam to participate in some driver safety training! He will be showing you tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 10
programme.desc: Spring has finally melted away the snow on the track and life on the Nürburgring is starting to flourish once again. It is full of drivers with gasoline in their hearts and cars that roar around the ring.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 11
programme.desc: It is time once again for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship! While the drivers are already out there doing test laps, we will be taking you behind the scenes and showing what really goes on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 12
programme.desc: Great cars and pretty girls. The Nürburgring is shaking as the VLN begins its second leg of the tournament. We will be commentating on this exciting competition, as well as showing highlights of the BMW's 1st leg win.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 13
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24 hour race. For the top teams and best drivers this is the last opportunity for a real hard test.

programme.title: Track Masters: Episode 14
programme.desc: Today, we are going to look back at the highlight of last week. The 24 hour race - as always it was exciting. In addition 'Strong Man Run' and a look at the tourist drivers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: The Master Key
programme.desc: When a pregnant mother and her two young sons are brutally slain, pressure mounts for the CSPD to catch the cold-blooded monster who did it.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: #1 Suspect
programme.desc: Lt. Joe Kenda must somehow solve a stranger-on-stranger crime with just a composite sketch of the killer and a mysterious bouquet of flowers.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Magic Bullet
programme.desc: A hard-working father of two is shot in the head just steps from a notorious strip club. The case is stuck in neutral until Kenda uncovers a conspiracy organized by an unlikely triggerman.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: A Prayer for the Dying
programme.desc: A mother of two is found dead in the most expensive part of Colorado Springs, leaving Lt. Joe Kenda stumped—until he looks into her personal life.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bump In the Night
programme.desc: When a pretty, young pilot is found in bed, bound and with a bullet in her head, Lt. Joe Kenda must determine if this was a random assault or payback for something that happened in the skies.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: My First Case
programme.desc: In his first case with the homicide unit, rookie burglary detective Joe Kenda volunteers to work a bloody multi-victim shooting deemed “unsolvable” by the veterans.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Bad Moon Rising
programme.desc: Night before Halloween, a real-life nightmare unfolds when a young man is found clinging to life. The case takes a dark turn when Lt. Joe Kenda learns there is a second victim somewhere in the woods.

programme.title: Homicide Hunter: Written in Blood
programme.desc: A community is shocked when Antoine McKenzie is brazenly shot outside an auto parts store in broad daylight. The only lead left for Lt. Joe Kenda is a final message written in the victim’s own blood.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Dexter and Nasir
programme.desc: A Chicago art teacher wants to unify her adopted Rottweiler/shepherd’s dual personality. Singer Patti LaBelle is afraid of her guard dog, an aggressive 150-pound South African boerboel.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Chloe, Gotti and Madison
programme.desc: A Border Collie/Greyhound mix develops dog aggression; an inherited pooch who was raised "Cesar's Way" loses his confidence; and 150 pound Leonberger, Madison, is like a bull in a china shop.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Goldie & Pepsi
programme.desc: Pepsi, a German Shepherd, becomes intensely aggressive around cats. Goldie, the beautiful Brittany Spaniel of “General Hospital” star Jacklyn Zeman that has become aggressive towards female dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Maxwell, Brooklyn, and Tipper
programme.desc: A spoiled Welsh Sealyham Terrier has dominance issues; an excitable English Mastiff has behavioral issues, and a territorial Tibetan Terrier needs help accepting other dogs.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Baby Girl
programme.desc: Suzie Dove Miles, a "cat whisperer," is set on getting a fearful Doberman mix at a shelter. Suzie has tried many of Cesar's exercises with Baby Girl, but needs Cesar’s expertise to help Baby Girl become a real dog.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Spike, Jake & Nugget, and Wendel
programme.desc: A wedding date is cancelled because the dogs can't get along; a German Shepherd that's so aggressive, even the German Shepherd rescue center won't take him; Sheltie barks at everything.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Molly, Jane, and Genoa
programme.desc: Cesar helps Molly, a blue heeler in Nebraska, get over the dangerous behavior of chasing and biting the tires of moving. An American Eskimo/border collie mix in Chicago, just won't go for a walk.

programme.title: The Dog Whisperer: Fondue, Chip, Hope & Joyjoy, and Elmer
programme.desc: A Hollywood couple had to turn down work because their French bulldog failed the Doggy Daycare entrance exam. Three Jack Russells began to fight each other when their owner got a serious boyfriend.
programme.sub-title: Fondue, Chip, Hope & Joyjoy, and Elmer

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: The Lamb/Eats Deodorant
programme.desc: Nicole has been addicted to eating deodorant for two years, consuming fifteen sticks per month. 27-year-old Audrey can't live without her stuffed lamb.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Pony Play / Addicted to Drinking Paint
programme.desc: For the past 20 years, Nicole has been addicted to Pony Play. Meanwhile, 43-year-old single mother of two Heather has been addicted to drinking paint for nearly three years.
programme.sub-title: Pony Play / Addicted to Drinking Paint

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Proud to be Plastic
programme.desc: Lacey, a 44-year-old mother of six has had at least 30 plastic surgery procedures and spent more than $250,000 building the most extreme body in the world.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Chews Dirty Diapers / Addicted to Leeches
programme.desc: 22-year-old Keyshia is addicted to chewing on urine-soaked diapers. Vladimir, a 50-year-old man, who uses leeches up to 40 times a year.
programme.sub-title: Chews Dirty Diapers / Addicted to Leeches

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to a Doll/Eats Plastic Bags
programme.desc: Robert, a 23-year-old man who's addicted to eating plastic newspaper bags, an addition so intense, that he goes days without food. Catherine, a 48-year-old woman whose best friend is a doll.
programme.sub-title: Addicted to a Doll/Eats Plastic Bags

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Married to a Doll/Picking My Scabs
programme.desc: Davecat has been married to his synthetic wife for 10 years. Meanwhile, Rachael hopes that her compulsive scab picking will stop by her wedding day.
programme.sub-title: Married to a Doll/Picking My Scabs

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Eats Couch Cushion/Furry
programme.desc: While battling her addiction to eating couch cushions, Adele has destroyed 7 couches and 2 chairs. Meanwhile, Lauren is more comfortable in her fur suit than in her own skin.

programme.title: My Strange Addiction: Addicted to My Breasts/Tape Eater
programme.desc: Sheyla has spent $250,000 on 22 breast enlargement surgeries to achieve her 38KKK bust size, despite suffering a severe infection from her recent implants. Andrea is addicted to eating adhesive tape.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Greg Dreams of Jeannie_The Amazing Squirrel
programme.desc: Greg’s obsession with 60’s pop-culture has literally taken over his home. Kelly’s life revolves around her pet squirrel, Sugar Bush and his photo appearances.
programme.sub-title: Greg Dreams of Jeannie_The Amazing Squirrel

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Mannequin Invasion_Carrot Queen
programme.desc: Chad Michael is a mannequin fanatic. His collection of over 300 mannequins has taken over every room of his house. Zizi has 35 carrot tattoos and she’s decorated every room with a carrot theme.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Buggin' Out_Dumpster Diet
programme.desc: Bugs have been a part of David’s daily diet for over twelve years, watch as he braces himself to eat his most venomous bug yet. Kelly’s daily diet consists of food solely gathered from the dumpster.

programme.title: My Crazy Obsession: Spin Cycle_Newborn Dolls
